```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)

library(ggplot2)

print_pal2 <- function(pal_name) {
  ggplot(data.frame(pal = sgplot::sg_colour_palettes[[pal_name]]), 
         aes(x=1:length(pal), y = 1, fill=factor(1:length(pal)))) +
    geom_tile() +
    sgplot::scale_fill_discrete_sg(pal_name) +
    theme_void()+
    theme(legend.position="none") 
}

```

The following colour palettes are available to use in `sgplot`:

**main**

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 1}
print_pal2("main")
```

**main2**

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 1}
print_pal2("main2")
```

**main6**

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 1}
print_pal2("main6")
```

**sequential**

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 1}
print_pal2("sequential")
```

**focus**

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 1}
print_pal2("focus")
```
